name: Mid-life Crisis
description:
"Maxwell was sick and tired of his old boring look and his thinning hair, so he wore a white hat and applied cyan eyeliner and lipstick for the first time. He didn't know if he liked it, so he decided to ask his date's opinion when he met her, but she never showed up."

Made with Krita painting software, in 3508x3508 dimensions with 72 pixels per inch, "Mid-life Crisis" is about redefining your identity to claim the right to be "unique", while self-alienation has already taken over.
